revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__ [[Category:Player vs Monster]] ==Bestiary== Here is a quick reference for some of the most sought after and strongest creatures you'll encounter on UOF. * Creature = Name of mob you will find in game * HP = This is the general range of their HP. It can be higher or lower than show but generally speaking it is within this range. Use the HP to gauge the danger level of the monster * Caster = Tells you if this monster is capable of casting spells or has ranged attacks * Dungeon = Dungeons these mobs are most commonly found in {| class="wikitable" ! style="font-weight: bold;" | Creature ! style="font-weight: bold;" | HP (Range) ! style="font-weight: bold;" | Caster/Range ! style="font-weight: bold;" | Dungeon ! style="font-weight: bold;" | Note |- ||

|- |} ==Archive== This is the archived old Bestiary which still has good information, but we wanted to move the Bestiary table to the top of the page. This is an ongoing list of beasts throughout the world of UOF. Loot Range Scale: 1 - 6 (1 being poor and 6 being wealthy). A mob with a scale of 1 could be considered poor and having few gold coins and not much additional loot. A mob with a scale of 6 could be considered wealthy having a large amount of gold and high chance at items like magic weapons/armor, gems, scrolls, etc. ===Undead=== These monsters are those consideredin the Undead category and have increased vulnerability slayers of that category. Validate [[Slayer Types]] for the exact match to monster type. [[File:Askeleton.PNG|left]] ====a skeleton==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 64 STR, 56 HP, 70 DEX, 28 INT, 16 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 1 * '''Data:''' A basic undead that exists across the land. [[File:Zombie.PNG|left]] ===a zombie=== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 62 STR, 68 HP, 37 DEX, 37 INT, 18 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 1 * '''Data:''' A basic undead that exists across the land. [[File:Alich.PNG|left]] ====a lich==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 197 STR, 195 HP, 131 DEX, 294 INT, 50 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 2 * '''Data:''' A skilled magic caster of the undead, watch out for back to back flamestrike spells. Hunt this monster during the month of April as it is [[Monster of the Month]] at that time. [[File:Amummy.PNG|left]] ====a mummy==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 359 STR, 347 HP, 77 DEX, 40 INT, 50 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 1 * '''Data:''' These are a mid-level melee fighter for the undead. [[File:Arottingcorpse.PNG|left]] ====a rotting corpse==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 347 STR, 1200 HP, 75 DEX, 177 INT, 40 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 4 * '''Data:''' These are a top-level melee fighter for the undead. They are able to hit with deadly and lethal poison. Their spell resistance is also so high direct damage spells do little if any damage. [[File:SkelKnight.PNG|left]] ===a skeletal knight=== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 218 STR, 213 HP, 83 DEX, 51 INT, 40 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 2 * '''Data:''' These are a mid-level melee fighter for the undead. ===Arachnid=== These monsters are those considered in the Arachnid category and have increased vulnerability to lesser and super slayers of that category. Validate [[Slayer Types]] for the exact match to monster type. [[File:Giantspider.PNG|left]] ====a giant spider==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 87 STR, 100 HP, 94 DEX, 39 INT, 16 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 1 * '''Data:''' A basic arachnid that exists across the land. Has the ability to poison on hit. ===Elemental=== These monsters are those considered in the Elemental category and have increased vulnerability to lesser and super slayers of that category. Validate [[Slayer Types]] for the exact match to monster type. [[File:WaterEle.PNG|left]] ====a water elemental==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]], [[Shame]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 151 STR, 137 HP, 83 DEX, 124 INT, 40 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 2 * '''Data:''' These are a basic-level magic caster for the various elementals. [[File:DeepWaterEle.PNG|left]] ====a deep water elemental==== * '''Location:''' [[Deceit]], [[Shame]] * '''Basic Stats:''' 404 STR, 858 HP, 112 DEX, 117 INT, 36 AR * '''Basic Loot:''' Loot Range: 4 * '''Data:''' These are a high-level magic caster for the various elementals. Also the main monster spawned from doing a [[Message in a Bottle]].
